title: Parents say 3-year-old grazed by stray bullet in Brockton
content:
Police are searching for a suspect after a shootout in Brockton.
One family member said a stray bullet flew through their home and grazed a 3-year-old—hitting the child in the leg.
Officers said the gunfire happened Saturday afternoon, shortly after a nearby peace rally ended.
Police said they’re looking suspects in two vehicles who were reportedly shooting at each other.
